title: 3 Ways How The Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Could Be Funded
description:
At the Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) 2025 Conference, a panel of experts outlined how the U.S. could build and fund a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, echoing moves traditionally made in gold, oil and other critical resources.
